ModMetaData.name: Cables and plumbing
ModMetaData.author: Medicalpol
ModMetaData.description:
Do you find it weird how pawns directly build power cables out of a single piece of steel on the bare ground in under a second ? Do you wish to run a wiring/pipe theft operation? Do you just desire to make your game slightly more complex for masochistic reasons? Well! Look no further!
Cables and plumbing adds two manufactured items, electrical cables and pipes, and patches power conduits and pipes to be built out of these two items. You can crudely make them on a crafting spot, albeit it's less profitable than if you would manufacture them in a smithy or a machining table. It's also patched for a few other mods! How incredible!
